name: I Am Adrian Paul Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Is Adrian Paul his full name?
questions.explanation:
No.

	His full name is Adrian Paul Hewitt. He was born in London, England, on May 29, 1959. He studied martial arts for seven years and is fluent in Italian and French, as well as English.

questions.text: Which Broadway play did Adrian star in?
questions.explanation:
Bouncers.

	Adrian starred in the Broadway play, "Bouncers" in 1987.

questions.text: Which science fiction show did Adrian have a steady role in during the show's second season?
questions.explanation:
War of The Worlds.

	In 1989, Adrian's first movie role was in "Last Rites" with Tom Berenger. He starred in an Edgar Allen Poe story titled "Masque of The Red Death," and acted in a CBS pilot called "The Owl."

Yes.

	Yes. He was married to Melani Hall Paul from 1990-1997. Melani is best known for her work as a Pepsi girl in the Ray Charles commercial. She also acted with her husband in his series episode "Counterfeit: Part One."

questions.text: What sport did Adrian play semi-pro for?
questions.explanation:
Soccer.

	Besides being a soccer fan, Adrian likes Reggae music, Mozart and Enigma.

questions.text: What was the name of the 1992 series that became Adrian Paul's most prominent acting job?
questions.explanation:
Highlander.

	"Highlander" aired from 1992 to 1997. Besides, having a starring role in the series, Adrian also directed several episodes. In 1993, he stopped a camera thief on the set from getting away until the police could come.

questions.text: The 1992 series he starred in became Adrian Paul's most prominent acting job: did Adrian ever have another series?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Yes. His second series was called "Tracker," but it was cancelled after one season in 2001. Adrian played an alien police officer who comes to earth to search for aliens from his planet.

questions.text: What spin-off did he star in several episodes of?
questions.explanation:
The Colbys.

	Adrian starred with Claire Yarlett in several episodes of "The Colbys" as a Russian ballet dancer named Koyla. This was his first major acting job.

questions.text: Adrian co-starred with Christopher Lambert in a 2000 "Highlander" movie?
questions.explanation:
True.

	Adrian made "Highlander: Endgame" with Christopher Lambert, Peter Wingfield, and Jim Byrnes.

questions.text: 'People' magazine named him sexiest action star in November 2000.
